BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Nasr O. Sheta, to the Council for its advice and consent regarding his appointment as a member of the Board of Standards and Appeals, pursuant to Section 31 and 659 of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Nasr O. Sheta, Board of Standards and Appeals

Items.Title: Mr. Michael Rivadeneyra, a resident of the Bronx, candidate for designation by the Council and subsequent appointment by the Mayor to the New York City Civilian Complaint Review Board.

Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
